Uses of Class
com.pusher.client.connection.ConnectionState

  • Packages that use ConnectionState 
    Package Description
    com.pusher.client
    Classes for connecting to Pusher, configuring the Pusher instance and authenticating subscriptions.
    com.pusher.client.connection
    Classes related to the Pusher connection, connection state and monitoring connection state changes.

    • Uses of ConnectionState in com.pusher.client

      Methods in com.pusher.client with parameters of type ConnectionState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pusher.connect(ConnectionEventListener eventListener, ConnectionState... connectionStates)
      Binds a ConnectionEventListener to the specified events and then connects to Pusher.

      The current connection state.
      ConnectionState ConnectionStateChange.getPreviousState()
      The previous connections state.

      Gets the current connection state.
      static ConnectionState ConnectionState.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static ConnectionState[] ConnectionState.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      boolean Connection.unbind(ConnectionState state, ConnectionEventListener eventListener)

      Constructors in com.pusher.client.connection with parameters of type ConnectionState 
      Constructor and Description
